ygData.subject: Re: Arrows
ygData.msgSnippet: Great, thanks a ton ... From: Charles Adams  I have a bunch of this info on my site if you want to take a look.
ygData.messageBody:
Great, thanks a ton

>>> Charles Adams <sirkal@...> 5.21.99 5:03:37 PM >>>
From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>

I have a bunch of this info on my site if you want to take a look.

http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/TSFrames.htm

It is my Fletching Guide to skill 80.

At 04:51 PM 5/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>Questions:
>
>1) I've heard that bow damage was calculated in the following mannor
>
>Bow Damage Rating x Arrow Damage Rating + 1
>
>The only arrows I've had access to have been the store bought arrows that
have a damage rating of 1, so as far as I can tell this calculation is true?
>
>2) I've never messed with fletching, but I'm assuming the higher quality
arrows actually have damage ratings higher than 1??
>
>3) What is the order of arrows, worst to best? What are they worth?
>
>4) I've just bought myself a nice bow, the single cam one, don't
exactally remember the name, but the damage is 16 range 100, what is a fair
price on it?
>
>5) Anybody on Veeshan server that wants to sell some better than store
bought arrows? As many as you have to sell, I'll buy, I'm willing to put
in an order for 100 and wait, if need be....
>
>Thanks,
>
>Salr D'Taynkk
>Dark Warrior of The Kith
>Veeshan
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>With more than 17 million e-mails exchanged daily...
>http://www.onelist.com
>...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
>
>
Xezol - Lvl 13 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
